item.description:
Yippeeee! We finally have a location for our October Maltese Meet.

It is going to be at the Newton branch of Especially for Pets. The link for the address and directions is below.

http://maltese.meetup...

Time is 1-4pm. I will now find out if Kate can come to give her Maltese Class that day and will let you know in my next email.

Maltese best,
Kim
laptopmaltese@aol.com
(508) 816 3974

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: OCT. 22, next Boston Maltese Meet at Espec. for Pets in Newton
